manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fit and Secure Standard Mattress HAAGEEP bed frame is designed to fit standard mattresses, and made refinement to prevent mattress slide.Mattress is inseted into this bed frame with 0.6 inches depth and slightly smaller inner dimensions.Lightly push your mattress into our bed frame as if building blocks. Say goodbye to annoying mattress shifts. Product Information Bed Frame Size: Full, 76 x 55 x 14 inchesInner Dimensions for Secure Mattress: 74.5 x 53.5 x 0.6 inchesCompatible Mattress: Full Mattresses, 75 x 54 inchesWeight Capacity: 1600 Pounds

Ample Storage and Easy Cleaning Standing at 14 inches in height, HAAGEEP bed frame boasts a generous storage space underneath.Thoughtful height is designed for easy cleaning, ensuring that your floor remains clean and hygienic.Ample storage area is easily accessible, makes storing and retrieving items a breeze. Needs of under-bed storage After moving into a smaller room, perhaps you need more storage space.Closet doesn't have enough space for excess or big items, HAAGEEP could help add extra storage space.Clean bedding has nowhere to be placed, you can store it under our bed frame.Give your pet a place to rest and play by clearing some space under the bed frame.When someone comes home with a big suitcase, you can temporarily keep it under the bed frame.

Incredibly Strong and Sturdy HAAGEEP bed frame able to support up to 1600 pounds. 9 legs construction and heavy-duty steel provide reliable stability.Feel free to jump on your bed. Our frame is built to handle it. Other Features HAAGEEP bed frame are equipped with specially designed foot pads for wooden floors.To ensure mattress longevity and comfortable sleep, our bed frame focus on proper slat spacing.Compact shipping box designed for easy movement into the room.Hardware package and slats are provided to meet assembly requirements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, nice and easily built
reviews.reviewText: I accidentally got the cal king for my king size. It was easily built and very sturdy. I am keeping it and using the extra bit with some wood over the holes at the end of the bed frame as a step up, as I kept my box frame as well. Super tall!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the cost.
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this bed frame is going to be hard to beat. On a larger frame(I got the Cali King) I would recommend a second person to help hold a couple of the supports in place while getting the bolts started, but other than that, assembly was a breeze. The frame is super sturdy and has space underneath for decent storage totes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to assemble and is very sturdy. No squeaks! You do have to watch your toes on the middle legs along the sides. My husband and I oth stubbed our toes putting the sheets on but we'll get black pipe insulation tubes to make them softer if we keep forgetting they're there. I would highly recommend this frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Delivery was NOT provided
reviews.reviewText: The bed frame was good and everything seems as explained. Was easy to assemble.The USPS driver did not deliver the product as expected, I had to go pick it up at the post office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lower Your Expectations
reviews.reviewText: Okay, I really expected this to be partly assembled and just a fold out. NO!!!!!Nothing assembled. I do admit it was easy to assemble, but not quick. The instructions are horrible. Matching part number to item is...well the screws etc, they are NOT labeled, it is count and guess.Then the cross bars. I suggest using a rubber mallet.In the end I got it together, but that middle leg.I have stubbed my toe on it so many times already in 4 days. I suggest getting a water noddle an cutting a slit in it and putting it around the leg. Less damage to the toes.But after it was together, it is very sturdy and stays in place. I can say it is very strong. Two adults sleep on it.Worth the money but just expect to assemble it all.Caution the Box is heavy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble! Very sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame is perfect. It was super easy to assemble, it took me about 20 mins from the time I opened the box until when I put my mattress on it. After reading the reviews, I purchased some insulation foam before the frame arrived. I made sure to put that on the exposed legs. This was a great tip as I hit my toes on the legs multiple times while making the bed, thankfully the foam saved me! I would highly recommend this frame to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to put together. My main concern was it being sturdy and to my surprise it was. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it! I don’t have rug and was afraid it’d be slippy. But its VERY steady and doesn’t move out of place. My mattress doesn’t sink in at all!! Unlike my last frame. Also takes so much less space than my last bed frame. It took a second person to help me with the first step. Gotta use both hands for the 1st part. You have to rotate the screw and nail opposite sides to tighten it. not sure how to describe too well .. but I over all love it so much and definitely worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No creaks or noises ! Very sturdy, solid and easy to assemble. This bed frame is exactly what I was looking for.
